card.name: Ezuri, Renegade Leader
card.property: {G}: Regenerate another target Elf. {2}{G}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Dwynen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

card.name: Dwynen's Elite
card.property: When this creature enters, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

card.name: Elvish Aberration
card.property: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.property: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

card.name: Elvish Branchbender
card.property: {T}: Until end of turn, target Forest becomes an X/X Treefolk creature in addition to its other types, where X is the number of Elves you control.

card.name: Elvish Mystic
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Elvish Vanguard
card.property: Whenever another Elf enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Ezuri's Archers
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever this creature blocks a creature with flying, this creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Gladehart Cavalry
card.property: When this creature enters, support 6. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six other target creatures.) Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Ivy Lane Denizen
card.property: Whenever another green creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Jagged-Scar Archers
card.property: Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control. {T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

card.name: Krosan Tusker
card.property: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle this card, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Do this before you draw.)

card.name: Kujar Seedsculptor
card.property: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Lead the Stampede
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Leaf Gilder
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Llanowar Empath
card.property: When this creature enters, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Nature's Way
card.property: Target creature you control gains vigilance and trample until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Nissa's Judgment
card.property: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Choose up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

card.name: Regal Force
card.property: When this creature enters, draw a card for each green creature you control.

card.name: Sylvan Advocate
card.property: Vigilance As long as you control six or more lands, this creature and land creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Talara's Battalion
card.property: Cast this spell only if you've cast another green spell this turn. Trample

card.name: Viridian Shaman
card.property: When this creature enters, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Wildheart Invoker
card.property: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Yeva, Nature's Herald
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) You may cast green creature spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood
card.property: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered this turn.

card.name: Tranquil Thicket
card.property: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Treetop Village
card.property: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {1}{G}: This land becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Goblin Welder
card.property: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

card.name: Artificer's Epiphany
card.property: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

card.name: Etherium Sculptor
card.property: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Faerie Mechanist
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Riddlesmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Treasure Mage
card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Trinket Mage
card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.property: When this creature enters, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Barrage Ogre
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: This creature deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Galvanic Blast
card.property: Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target. Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage instead if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Ghirapur Gearcrafter
card.property: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. (A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Welding Sparks
card.property: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Maverick Thopterist

card.name: Reclusive Artificer
